Title: 'Why I loved a deadline day deal'
Description: In his BBC Sport column, ex-Premier League boss Tony Pulis explains why the right deadline day signing can transform your team's fortunes, but sometimes it is not just about the effect a deal has on the pitch.

Title: Google Pixel 10a vs. Pixel 10: How will Google's affordable model stack up?
Description:
The Google Pixel 10a isn't out yet, and we don't know all the details.
But we can help you decide if you should wait or grab the Pixel 10 today.

Title: Google Pixel 10a vs. Pixel 9a: Will it be worth the upgrade?
Description:
The Google Pixel 10a should arrive in March with hopefully a better display, faster charging, and the same price.
It's not expected to be a major overhaul over the 9a, so should you wait till March or pull the trigger now?

Title: The House races to end shutdown. And, Trump wants to close Kennedy Center for 2 years
Description:
Lawmakers are racing to end a partial government shutdown after Congress missed its funding deadline on Friday.
And, Trump wants to close the Kennedy Center for two years for renovations.

Title: Linux Kernel Developer Chris Mason's New Initiative: AI Prompts for Code Reviews
Description:
Phoronix reports: Chris Mason, the longtime Linux kernel developer most known for being the creator of Btrfs, has been working on a Git repository with AI review prompts he has been working on for LLM-assisted code review of Linux kernel patches.
This initi…

Title: Is the TV Industry Finally Conceding That the Future May Not Be 8K?
Description:
"Technology companies spent part of the 2010s trying to convince us that we would want an 8K display one day..." writes Ars Technica.
"However, 8K never proved its necessity or practicality." LG Display is no longer making 8K LCD or OLED panels, Flatpane…

Title: America's K-shaped economy has turned restaurant winners and losers upside down
Description: Usually, fast-food consumption is a reliable recession indicator, but in a K-shaped economy, the old playbook has broken down, analysts say.

Title: Europe’s not-so-dry January: Unicorns and a new tech identity
Description:
Every January, millions take on Dry January, a ritual of restraint and resetting after the holiday season.
If that’s the benchmark for kicking off the year with moderation, Europe’s startup ecosystem clearly didn’t get the memo.
In the opening weeks of 2026,…

Title: Fixing Sony and Philips’ Doomed CD-i Console
Description: Although not intended to be a game console, the CD-i would see a a couple of games released for it that would cement its position in gaming history as the butt of countless jokes, some of which sti…

Title: WATCH: Drone footage shows Myrtle Beach after winter storm
Description: The City of Myrtle Beach shared drone footage Sunday of the popular South Carolina beach town after this weekend's winter storm.

Title: Silent Hill f Actors Appointed Tourism Ambassadors for Japanese City That Inspired the Game
Description: Two actors from Silent Hill f revealed today that they have been appointed ambassadors of the real life location in Japan that inspired the survival horror game’s eerie setting.

Title: Nioh 3 Could be Coming to More Consoles Than Just PS5 Sooner Than You Think
Description: Nioh 3 is slated to release on Friday, February 6, on PC via Steam and PS5, but the game's latest trailer has revealed that Xbox and maybe even Nintendo Switch 2 owners may not have too long a wait for a version of their own.

Title: My (very) fast zero-allocation webserver using OxCaml
Description: Building httpz, a high-performance HTTP/1.1 parser with zero heap allocation using OxCaml's unboxed types, local allocations, and mutable local variables.

Title: Here's how Google Home gets the data for its weather forecast
Description: Including the temperature, air quality, and UV index

Title: Celebrate Groundhog Day with 6 bizarre groundhog facts
Description: Groundhogs don’t really forecast the weather, but there are plenty of other strange things about these rodents

Title: Decoding DNA’s ‘dark matter’ with AI, keeping a man alive without lungs, and cracking a botanical mystery
Description: How a new AI model could help us better understand noncoding DNA, how doctors kept a man alive without lungs for two days, and what a peculiar flower can teach us about evolution

Title: Googleの新AI「Genie」とは？なぜゲーム会社の株価が下落するのか？
Description: Image:Google新しいAIが出ると、その影響もすぐに出るなぁ…。Googleが2026年1月29日に発表した「ProjectGenie」は、ユーザーが望むままに3Dワールドを生成できるAIツールです。当たり前のように、ユーザーは自由に、作った世界の中を歩き回れます。実験的な公開であるにも関わらず、UnityやRobloxといったゲーム関連企業の株価が10-20%ほど、急落しています。既に非
